divs: Sighting DetailsIt is a clear night with many stars visible. There are no clouds. My wife and Icommented on how the moon had recently risen as it was almost full. About 5minutes later, I looked for the moon again but it was gone It was as ifsomething huge was in front of it blocking our view. I scanned the sky verycarefully and could not see anythingno moon, no clouds, just stars, although the sky itself was bright. I leftconfused and wondering what had happened. When I looked again about a half hourlater, there was the moon again I am a former astronomy consultant to CUFORN anda former member of MUFON. I am curious to know if anyone else saw thisphenomenon By the way, the year is 2003, although that option isnt available onyour siteform. Please update
Summary: Almost Full Moon vanished then reappeared
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bobcaygeon
This sighting has never been favorited.
